channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Magnétomètre quantique : l'ESA et SBQuantum à l'avant-garde de l'observation de la Terre
item.description: Dans le cadre de son programme d'observation de la Terre, FutureEO, l'Agence spatiale européenne a conclu un partenariat stratégique avec l'entreprise canadienne SBQuantum pour concevoir un prototype de capteur magnétomètre quantique. Ce capteur, doté de performances avancées, a pour ambition de...

item.title: How to watch the Intel CES 2026 launch event
item.description: SOPA Images via Getty Images We're just hours away from the start of CES 2026, and with that comes Intel's launch event. The chip giant is expected to provide more details on its AI PC initiative and the new processors powering it: The Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs (aka Panther Lake) are made using an 18A process — that's 18 angstroms, or just under 2nm — and designed for high-end laptops and gaming devices. For Intel, the stakes at CES are higher than ever. In the past 12 months, both NVIDIA and the US government acquired ownership stakes in the company, helping nearly double the stock price by th...

item.title: Jackery’s solar-powered Gazebo is a good DIY idea
item.description: Jackery, the home battery company, is back at CES with a solar-powered Gazebo it swears you'll be able to buy in the second half of the year, starting in California. With an expected price of between $12,000 and $15,000 before adding any battery storage, you might want to save a few bucks and build one […]

item.title: Govee’s latest smart lights can make your ceiling more interesting
item.description: Govee is known for putting lights in every corner of your room: in your bulb sockets, in the corner for a little multicolored bias lighting, and even behind the TV with its scene-matching LED strips. And it has some curious announcements at CES 2026 that tackle a new part of the room: the ceiling. Govee […]

item.title: Pro-Ject's new premium turntable promises "analogue excellence" — but it's from its more beginner-friendly range
item.description: The Pro-Ject Debut Reference 10 is another beautiful turntable from the Austrian audiophiles

item.title: Govee's CES lineup includes a ceiling lamp that simulates skylights
item.description: Govee, which makes some of the more unique and interesting smart lighting products, has a new batch at CES 2026. That includes two ceiling lights (one of which simulates a skylight) and a floor lamp that supports trillions of colors.Govee describes the new Ceiling Light Ultra as "the industry's first ceiling light designed as a true creative canvas." It uses 616 individually controlled LEDs (the highest in its class, according to Govee) to provide that level of detail. Using the Govee app, you can design visuals for it "with up to eight distinct layers of motion, color and shapes."Govee Ceilin...

item.title: Test de l’Amazfit Active Max : une montre de sport accessible, avec 25 jours d’autonomie et un écran lumineux
item.description: Avec l'Active Max, Amazfit propose non seulement une montre de sport accessible, mais aussi un modèle avec plusieurs semaines d'autonomie malgré un écran Amoled lumineux. Voici son test complet.

item.title: 15 Best Electrolyte Powders (2026): Tasty and Effective
item.description: Get those lost minerals back with the help of our top picks.

item.title: A New Bridge Links the Strange Math of Infinity to Computer Science
item.description: Descriptive set theorists study the niche mathematics of infinity. Now, they’ve shown that their problems can be rewritten in the concrete language of algorithms.

item.title: Subtle releases ear buds with its noise cancelation models
item.description: Subtle's new $199 earbuds will also let you dictate in any app on desktop or phone

item.title: USB hit the scene 30 years ago this month - we look back on its journey to standardization success
item.description: From USB 1.0 to USB-C, we’ve come a long way to reach some degree of standardization

item.title: ExpressVPN's road to accessible privacy — is it really possible in 2026?
item.description: 2025 was a year of structural change for the industry giant. From breaking away from its one-size-fits-all pricing model to leading the charge on post-quantum standards, here is how ExpressVPN adapted to a changing market.
